message: Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire a unique product that I believe holds immense value for you, estimated at $1,500,000. I understand the importance of such a significant investment and have tailored my offer with your best interests in mind. For this exceptional product, I propose a purchase price of $1,200,000. This offer reflects a strategic balance between the product's true worth and the value it brings to you. Should you choose to accept, you will be making a smart financial decision that could potentially yield substantial returns. If you need more information or have any questions, please do not hesitate to reach out. I look forward to the possibility of working together.
